text: Your Son and Brother () is a 1965 Soviet drama movie directed by Vasily Shukshin.От СССР до наших дней. Десять фильмов, которые снимали на АлтаеВАШ СЫН И БРАТ It stars Vsevolod Sanayev, Leonid Kuravlyov, and Anastasia Filippova. ==Actors== * Vsevolod Sanayev as Yermolai Voyevodin * Leonid Kuravlyov as Stepan Voyevodin * Anastasia Filippova as mother * Marta Grakhova as Vera Voyevodina * Aleksei Vanin as Ignaty Voyevodin * Leonid Reutov as Maxim Voyevodin * Viktor Shakhov as Vasily Voyevodin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1965 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vasily Shukshin
title: Your Son and Brother
